author: J. Edward Moreno
title: California reports highest one-day rise in coronavirus cases
description: California reported 2,318 new coronavirus cases Monday, marking the highest one-day jump the state has seen.On Tuesday the California Department of Public Health reported a total of 30,978 confirmed ca...
content:
California reported 2,318 new coronavirus cases Monday, marking the highest one-day jump the state has seen.
On Tuesday the California Department of Public Health reported a total of 30,978 confirmed cases and 1,208 deaths. The number of confirmed cases in t… [+1825 chars]
